However, life changes for the Clocks when a human boy discovers Arrietty.","poster_path":"/3lSRaSjDp2nkXMQkzzjpRi3035O.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"ja","genre_ids":[14,16,10751],"popularity":65.026,"release_date":"2010-07-16","video":false,"vote_average":7.7,"vote_count":2746},{"backdrop_path":"/mazqYfDUreT2KE6ZsaWT59JARHZ.jpg","id":83389,"title":"From Up on Poppy Hill","original_title":"コクリコ坂から","overview":"Yokohama, 1963. Japan is picking itself up from the devastation of World War II and preparing to host the 1964 Olympics—and the mood is one of both optimism and conflict as the young generation struggles to throw off the shackles of a troubled past. They came up with an efficient and cost effective plan of sending cockroaches and mold to the surface so that the mold would absorb the sunlight and the insect corpses would serve as a food source for the mold.  It is now the year 2577 and the first manned ship to Mars has landed on the planet and the six crew members are ready for their mission. But what they find are giant mutated humanoid cockroaches with incredible physical strength. The crew members are easily wiped out, but not before sending a transmission back to Earth. Now, humanity will send elite warriors to exterminate the mutated bugs and claim back Mars.","poster_path":"/z1A7bajfwadBi5eAgXiWDMpY5i9.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"ja","genre_ids":[28,27,878],"popularity":16.976,"release_date":"2016-04-29","video":false,"vote_average":6.1,"vote_count":250},{"backdrop_path":"/6BhqBYXQvlIOgGfkhF4aR3tTRW.jpg","id":21057,"title":"Ocean Waves","original_title":"海がきこえる","overview":"At Kichijōji Station, Tokyo, Taku Morisaki glimpses a familiar woman on the platform opposite boarding a train. As Christmas approaches, Rose uses her fantastical experiences as a professional wrestler, her imagination, wit and charm to allow Oscar to live life and love to the full, in the company of his friends Pop Corn, Einstein, Bacon and childhood sweetheart Peggy Blue. Written by American Film Market","poster_path":"/xjBERQq2t1MKhlDnKuob8OTnHsI.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"fr","genre_ids":[18,10751],"popularity":19.137,"release_date":"2009-11-15","video":false,"vote_average":6.5,"vote_count":79},{"backdrop_path":"/7750THD8ryYj5nIMx3IPIIzy0eR.jpg","id":39422,"title":"Door on the Left as You Leave the Elevator","original_title":"À gauche en sortant de l’ascenseur","overview":"Yan is a successful artist. One day he is waiting for his date Florence to turn up at his apartment. As the doorbell rings, he finds another young woman in underwear on his doorstep: his neighbor Eva! She tells him she locked herself out of her apartment and insists that he helps her. Whilst Yan is trying to enter Eva's apartment via their adjoining balcony, his phone rings. It is Florence, and she is not impressed when a female voice answers the phone. At this point, Eva's rabidly jealous boyfriend Boris returns home. Seeing Yan in his apartment, he deduces that Eva has been having an affair behind his back. Florence then turns up and Yan tries in vain to explain the situation. By chance, Florence's husband suddenly puts in an appearance. After that, it all starts to get a bit complicated.","poster_path":"/arCAOtJaFK0T1PUq278DbigPfqh.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"fr","genre_ids":[35],"popularity":6.841,"release_date":"1988-08-31","video":false,"vote_average":6.2,"vote_count":81},{"backdrop_path":"/q4NXURsBy6w9JIkpBfoDkpPNMcc.jpg","id":52686,"title":"Horus: Prince of the Sun","original_title":"太陽の王子ホルスの大冒険","overview":"Young Horus lives in a mythical Scandinavia of the Iron Age.
